title: An agent or trustee who receives the rent of a or is entrusted with or is concerned with any buildin
clause_text: An agent or trustee who receives the rent of a or is entrusted with or is concerned with any building devoted to religious or charitable purposes;
section: Special Regulations for the Improvement Schemes :
